title: Identify PC output on monopoly graph

content.description: The following questions are based on the graph below, which shows the cost and revenue curves of a monopoly firm.
content.question: If this were a perfectly competitive industry with the same costs as shown on the graph, the equilibrium price and output would be which of the following?

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
